basic.color: Flower color red, leaf color green

maintenance.soil: Slightly acidic soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes half shade, grows with bright scattered light
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead and pest branches timely；remove peduncle after flowering
